TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TerminateWorkflow extends System.Activities.NativeActivity
Public NotInheritable Class TerminateWorkflow Inherits NativeActivity
public ref class TerminateWorkflow sealed : System::Activities::NativeActivity

Docs.summary: 终止正在运行的工作流实例，在宿主中引发 事件，并报告错误信息。 工作流终止后将无法恢复。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void CacheMetadata(valuetype System.Activities.NativeActivityMetadata metadata) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub CacheMetadata (metadata As NativeActivityMetadata)
Public Property Exception As InArgument(Of Exception)
public: property System::Activities::InArgument<Exception ^> ^ Exception { System::Activities::InArgument<Exception ^> ^ get(); void set(System::Activities::InArgument<Exception ^> ^ value); };
member this.Exception : System.Activities.InArgument<Exception> with get, set

Docs.summary: 获取或设置导致实例终止的异常。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果仅设置了 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>，则传递到 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> 的异常为 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>。 如果仅设置了 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>，则会将该异常传递到 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>。 如果设置了 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> 和 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>，则会随指定的 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> 一起传递 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>，并将 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> 设置为异常的 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性。 如果两者均未设置，则会创建默认 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>。

Protected Overrides Sub Execute (context As NativeActivityContext)
Public Property Reason As InArgument(Of String)

public: property System::Activities::InArgument<System::String ^> ^ Reason { System::Activities::InArgument<System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(System::Activities::InArgument<System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.Reason : System.Activities.InArgument<string> with get, set

Docs.summary: 一个字符串输入参数，其中包含工作流实例终止的原因。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果仅设置了 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>，则传递到 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> 的异常为 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>。 如果仅设置了 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>，则会将该异常传递到 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>。 如果设置了 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> 和 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>，则会随指定的 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> 一起传递 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>，并将 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> 设置为异常的 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性。 如果两者均未设置，则会创建默认 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>。
